mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.circle_id AS "circleId", a.name AS "name", a.description AS "description", a.location AS "location", a.location_detail AS "locationDetail", a.open_time AS "openTime", a.phone AS "phone", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", c.name AS "circleName"
LEFT JOIN business_circle c ON a.circle_id = c.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM business_market a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND c.name LIKE '%'||#{circleName}||'%' '%'+#{circleName}+'%' concat('%',#{circleName},'%')
AND a.location LIKE '%'||#{location}||'%' '%'+#{location}+'%' concat('%',#{location},'%')

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_market( id, circle_id, name, description, location, location_detail, open_time, phone, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{circleId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{location}, #{locationDetail}, #{openTime}, #{phone}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE business_market SET circle_id = #{circleId}, name = #{name}, description = #{description}, location = #{location}, location_detail = #{locationDetail}, open_time = #{openTime}, phone = #{phone}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
